name: react-security-scanner

repo_url.description: URL of the git repository to scan (use this OR path)

path.description: Local directory path to scan (use this OR repo_url)

scan_mode.description: What to scan: full (everything), deps-only (CVEs), or patterns-only (code patterns)

framework.description: Framework to target (auto-detected if not specified)
